item.title: EP 1024 - The Utah County Baby Eating Fiasco
item.itunes:title: The Utah County Baby Eating Fiasco
item.description:
Today we find out The Rock is recovering from his recent loss of legs, and then we travel to Utah County to meet an attorney who swears he has never eaten a baby!

 

Oregon Ghost Conference

http://www.oregonghostconference.com/

March 24-26th 2023

Seaside, Oregon

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

PayPal Donation Link

https://tinyurl.com/mrxe36ph

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

Dead Rabbit Radio Wiki

https://deadrabbitradio.pods.monster/doku.php?id=Welcome

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

Dangerous blood clots form in leg arteries of COVID-19 patients

https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2020/07/200716144706.htm

COVID and Blood Clots: What’s the Risk?

https://www.goodrx.com/conditions/covid-19/can-covid-cause-blood-clots

Relationship between blood clots and COVID-19 vaccines: A literature review

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9055170/

The Link Between J&J’s COVID Vaccine and Blood Clots: What You Need to Know

https://www.yalemedicine.org/news/coronavirus-vaccine-blood-clots

Jeremy Renner Critically Injured in Snowplow Accident: Everything to Know

https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/pictures/jeremy-renner-injured-in-snowplow-accident-what-to-know/

Jeremy Renner Shares Look at His Physical Therapy After Snowplow Accident

(I saw this after recording, he looks like he is doing better!)

https://www.etonline.com/jeremy-renner-shares-look-at-his-physical-therapy-after-snowplow-accident-198679

The Rock's Mother Involved in Car Crash

https://comicbook.com/wwe/news/the-rock-mother-ata-johnson-car-crash/

Roman Reigns Comments on The Rock Not Being in Ring Shape for WWE WrestleMania Match

https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10063263-roman-reigns-comments-on-the-rock-not-being-in-ring-shape-for-wwe-wrestlemania-match

Zion Clark, a wrestler born without legs, wins MMA debut

https://www.espn.com/mma/story/_/id/35293033/zion-clark-wrestler-born-legs-wins-mma-debut

SATANIC ABUSE IN UTAH

https://archive.ph/pqNam

What’s known about the ritual sex ring under investigation in Utah County

https://www.sltrib.com/news/2022/06/23/whats-known-about-ritual/

Utah County Attorney calls for sheriff to resign, saying the top cop may have tried to implicate him in ‘ritualistic’ sex ring investigation

https://www.sltrib.com/news/2022/06/01/utah-county-attorney/

Utah County Attorney David Leavitt has been talking about ritualistic sex abuse suspect for years

https://www.fox13now.com/news/fox-13-investigates/utah-county-attorney-david-leavitt-has-been-talking-about-ritualistic-sex-abuse-for-years

Utah County Attorney David Leavitt loses reelection bid to Republican challenger Jeff Gray

https://www.sltrib.com/news/politics/2022/06/28/challenger-jeff-gray-takes/

Why the Utah County Attorney got rid of the special victims unit, despite criticism from police and his own prosecutors

https://www.sltrib.com/news/politics/2022/06/07/top-issue-utah-county/

Utah County attorney press conference

https://www.facebook.com/ksltv/videos/695762918343831

Justice Department arrests former ABC News journalist on child pornography charges

https://www.semafor.com/article/02/01/2023/fbi-set-to-announce-journalists-arrest-on-child-pornography-charges

Armie Hammer Breaks His Silence

https://airmail.news/issues/2023-2-4/armie-hammer-breaks-his-silence

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Simple

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

YouTube Champ Stewart Meatball

The Haunted Mic Arm provided by Chyme Chili

The Golden Rabbit Army: Fabio N, Chyme Chili, Greg Gourley

Wiki By Germ

Pintrest https://www.pinterest.com/basque5150/jason-carpenter-hood-river/

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@deadrabbitradio

Jason Carpenter

PO Box 1363

Hood River, OR 97031

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
